Questions.Question: Is there anyone living in your household employed in the sale, manufacture, distribution of tobacco products, marketing research, or advertising?
Is there anyone living in your home between the ages of 25-49 who smokes?
Do you speak to that person?
About how many cigarettes do you smoke per day?
Questions.Answer: IF LESS THAN HALF A PACK OR LESS THAN 10 CIGARETTES PER DAY, TERMINATE

Questions.Question: What is your regular brand of cigarettes that you smoke most often?
Is that the regular size or the longer 100?
Questions.Answer: Quota more than two in each group or the extra long 120, TERMINATE

Questions.Question: Have you purchased at least one pack of any brand of cigarettes advertised low tar in the last 6 months?
Are you employed?
Questions.Answer: FEMALE GROUPS SHOULD BE COMPOSED ABOUT EQUALLY OF WOMEN WHO WORK OUTSIDE THE HOME AND FULL-TIME HOMEMAKERS, MALE GROUPS ARE TO BE EMPLOYED MEN

Questions.Question: Have you participated in Marketing Research group discussion in the past 6 months?
